info.description: RESTful webservice to enable integration from commerce platform to backend ERP system for given scoped global function
info.title: websitesvc

post.description: Stock information per location for given regional part number

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.description: Get Detail Sales Order information for given regional order number

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: input regional sales order key information

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.description: Search list of sales orders for given criteria

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: input data to perform sales order search

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.description: Create Sales Order in regional ERP

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: input data consists of Sales Order header and Sales Order details to create order in ERP

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request

post.description: Create new website user in CRM system as new Lead/Opportunity

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: input data to create new lead

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request body for the operation

e1AccountNumber.description: E1 account number managed by DMS

SalesOrderHeader.description: model to store Sales Order Header information

OrderLineInfo.description: model to store Order Line information

SalesOrderTimeTrack.description: model to store sales order dates

SalesOrder.description: model to store sales order information

SalesOrderDetails.description: model to store Sales Order Line Item information

SpecialInstructionsCBO.description: mode to store Special Instruction information

additionalCarrierInformation.description: Format to JDE : Additional Carrier Information:: value

acceptedTermsAndConditions.description: Format to JDE : AcceptedTermsAndConditions: value as enum below

frieghtSystem.description: Format to JDE : Frieght System: value

shippingCarrier.description: Format to JDE : Shipping Carrier: [frieghtType] carrierNumber carrierCodeDescription

otherSpecialNotes4.description: concat of Addr 1/2/3/4, city, state, zip and country

otherSpecialNotes7.description: Format to JDE : Accepted Overage: true/false value

otherSpecialNotes8.description: Total Shipping charge incl Tax and Currency

partnumbersToBeExcluded.description: item number to be excluded from sales order

SpecialInstructions.description: mode to store Special Instruction information

customerType.description: In case of order entry, allowed values are in enum as Single Character. In case of search sales order, allowed values are verbiage

e1AccountNumber.description: In case of material order entry, this field should have E1 Account number. Also this should have same value as aeE1AccountNumber in case customerType E

aeE1AccountNumber.description: In case of sample order entry, this field should have AE E1 Account number or else send in otherSpecialNote2

contactFirstName.description: In case of Ship To, attentionTo first name

contactLastName.description: In case of Ship To, attentionTo last name

name.description: In case of Ship To, name is organization name

address1.description: In case of Ship To, MW make Contact First and Last Name to Addr1 for ERP

address2.description: In case of Ship To, Address Line 1 will be saved in address2

address3.description: In case of Ship To, address3 is concat of Address Line 2 and 3

address4.description: In case of Ship To, address4 is Shipping Contact telephone

state.description: Underscore delimited State and Country ISO Code

State.description: Signup User underscore delimited Country & State ISO code

DistinguishedName.description: deprecated Signup User unique combination of heirarchy - user/org/root Please see example for more information

LogonID.description: Signup User unique website logon id

Value.Value: Yes, and I need flooring ASAP!

ContextAttribute.description: all below fields are optional. If CRMRowId is present with Lead_<crm row id> or Contact_<crm row id> and service will update existing Lead or Contact.

orderType.description: Website order type Material or Sample

actionType.description: A - add, D - delete, C - changed. Default A

orderProcessName.description: M1 - for material, S1 - for samples. It will be set based on orderType

errorCode.description: wrapper error codes to indicate origination of backend server error

errorDesc.example: Error Occurrent in MW. Invalid Item Number
errorDesc.description: MW1xxxE will be MW errors, MW2xxxE JDE , MW3xxxE CRM and MWX unknown

projectName.description: project name associated with sales order

jobName.description: job name associated with sales order

marketCode.description: market code as defined by DMS and managed in ERP

marketSegment.description: market segment as defined by DMS and managed in ERP

changeReasonCode.description: in case of order edit process, change reason code

webDisplayableE1OrderNumber.description: displayable order number. Hyphen delimited website displayable ERP order number and order type

OrderIdentifier.description: Object model to distinguish Sales Order in various system of records

externalCompanyNo.description: Store id which signifies Store Front Company Number

CompanyInfo.description: Object model for company or site information

id.description: order identifier for which this tax is going to be calculated

itemNumber.description: ERP second item number. It can be Carpet, Vinyl Sheet, Vinyl Tile,  Rigid Core, Collateral, Adhsives etc

id.description: Store id (Site id) which signifies Store Front Company Number, its mapped to JDE Branch Plant value (W1, CW1 etc)

dyelotkey.description: Static key name per HCL commerce managed codes

dyelotQnty.description: it is set as underscore delimited DYELOT & Quantity

itemNumber.description: ERP second item number. It can be Carpet, Vinyl Sheet, Vinyl Tile,  Rigid Core, Collateral, Adhsives etc

storeNumber.description: Store id which signifies Store Front Company Number

storeName.description: Store Front or Company Number Name

UOM.description: Unit Of Measure, as per HCL commerce managed codes

itemTotalQty.description: Total Available Quantity across all dyelots

userReservedField1.description: Shipping Contact First Name And Last Name

Value.description: there are enums for few attributes eg. ProjectDuration
